synopsis.text: From the serene shores of a quaint coastal town, the tale of Hinako, a passionate college student, unfolds. Hinako's heart belongs to the thrill of surfing, yet her future remains a daunting enigma. A fateful fire brings her face-to-face with Minato, a dashing firefighter whose selfless devotion to others captivates her. As their shared love for surfing and each other deepens, an unexpected tragedy strikes, leaving Hinako bereft and unable to face the ocean she once adored. However, the melody of a cherished song brings Minato back to her, appearing in any watery surface as she sings. As Hinako embarks on a poignant journey of self-discovery, she grapples with the mystery of Minato's return and the possibility of a forever together. This heartwarming anime film, "Ride Your Wave," beautifully intertwines love, loss, and the pursuit of one's true calling.
